```{r tidy=FALSE,warning=FALSE,comment=NA,message=FALSE,comment=NA,prompt=FALSE,collapse=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
#input data
#for UI use this else comment it
base_path="/home/devtest/"
#for local system use this else comment it
#base_path="D:/Work/aug1stweek/"
ab3<-read.csv(paste(base_path,"querymanual",sep=""),sep="\t")

```

```{r tidy=FALSE,warning=FALSE,comment=NA,message=FALSE,comment=NA,prompt=FALSE,collapse=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
#operations
#new columns added
ab3$t_netrev<-ab3$t_rev-ab3$t_cost
ab3$dte<-as.Date(as.character(ab3$dte))
ab3$cid_mod_group<-ifelse(ab3$cid_mod_group=="0","quadratic",ifelse(ab3$cid_mod_group=="1","quadratic_simulator","quadratic_synthscore"))

predata<-ab3[ab3$period=='PRE',]
postdata<-ab3[ab3$period=='POST',]
prenrevsum<-aggregate(predata$t_netrev,by=list(predata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_netrev")
postnrevsum<-aggregate(postdata$t_netrev,by=list(postdata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_netrev")
preimpsum<-aggregate(predata$t_impr,by=list(predata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_impressions")
postimpsum<-aggregate(postdata$t_impr,by=list(postdata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_impressions")
preclsum<-aggregate(predata$t_clicks,by=list(predata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_clicks")
postclsum<-aggregate(postdata$t_clicks,by=list(postdata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_clicks")
preredsum<-aggregate(predata$t_red,by=list(predata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_redirects")
postredsum<-aggregate(postdata$t_red,by=list(postdata$dte),FUN=sum);colnames(prenrevsum)<-c("dte","sum_redirects")

#plots
plot(prenrevsum$dte,prenrevsum$sum_redirects,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Netrev",main="Pre Period sum of netrev per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(postnrevsum$Group.1,postnrevsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Netrev",main="Post Period sum of netrev per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(preimpsum$Group.1,preimpsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Impressions",main="Pre Period sum of impressions per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(postimpsum$Group.1,postimpsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Impressions",main="Post Period sum of impressions per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(preclsum$Group.1,preclsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Clicks",main="Pre Period sum of clicks per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(postclsum$Group.1,postclsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Clicks",main="Post Period sum of clicks per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(preredsum$Group.1,preredsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Redirects",main="Pre Period sum of redirects per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")
plot(postredsum$Group.1,postredsum$x,type="l",xlab="Day",ylab="Sum of Redirects",main="Post Period sum of redirects per day analysis",font=2,family="mono",lty=4,col.lab="Blue",col="red",col.main="tan3")


losspre<-predata[predata$t_netrev<0,]
losspost<-postdata[postdata$t_netrev<0,]
losspre<-losspre[order(losspre$t_netrev),]
losspost<-losspost[order(losspost$t_netrev),]
toppreloss<-losspre[1:20,]
toppostloss<-losspost[1:20,]

ab3_quad<-ab3[ab3$cid_mod_group=='quadratic',]
ab3_quad_loss<-ab3_quad[ab3_quad$t_netrev<0,]
ab3_quad_loss_od<-ab3_quad_loss[order(ab3_quad_loss$t_netrev),]
toploss_quad<-ab3_quad_loss_od[1:20,]

ab3_sim<-ab3[ab3$cid_mod_group=='quadratic_simulator',]
ab3_sim_loss<-ab3_sim[ab3_sim$t_netrev<0,]
ab3_sim_loss_od<-ab3_sim_loss[order(ab3_sim_loss$t_netrev),]
toploss_sim<-ab3_sim_loss_od[1:20,]

ab3_synth<-ab3[ab3$cid_mod_group=='quadratic_synthscore',]
ab3_synth_loss<-ab3_synth[ab3_synth$t_netrev<0,]
ab3_synth_loss_od<-ab3_synth_loss[order(ab3_synth_loss$t_netrev),]
toploss_synth<-ab3_synth_loss_od[1:20,]
```
<p><b><u> Loss Making cid for pre A/B Test data</u></b></p>
```{r results='asis',warning=FALSE,error=FALSE,echo=F,comment=NA,tidy = F}
library(xtable)
x=toppreloss
cnames=colnames(x)
x=t(x)
x=apply(x,2,as.character)
x=as.data.frame(x)
x=t(x)
x=as.data.frame(x)
cnames->colnames(x)
print(xtable(x,display=rep("s",dim(x)[2]+1)),type="html",include.rownames=FALSE)
```
